name: A Maldição de Ouro Preto
description:
my first game and the only one that i made outside a game engine (using Processing), i made that game with my group in the college and i made all the coding, level design and puzzle, actually I'm really proud of him.

*this game is all in PT-BR, impossible to beat the puzzle without know Portuguese, if you can't read here is the puzzle solution...
